about.heading: About Us
about.content:
We are Trident Robotics Team 4296, a student-led high school robotics team dedicated to designing, building, and competing with innovative robots. Our mission is to spark curiosity, foster collaboration, and push the boundaries of technology through hands-on engineering experiences.

Founded in 2012, our team has grown into a community where students gain real-world skills in design, mechanical engineering, electrical systems, and programming. We don‚Äôt just build robots‚Äîwe build future engineers, problem-solvers, and leaders.

Every season, our team comes together with one goal: to turn imagination into innovation and prove that when teamwork meets technology, the possibilities are endless.

timeline.title: First Robotics Meeting
timeline.description: We had our first meeting to kickoff the season!

timeline.title: STEM Activity Day
timeline.description: STEM activity where we try to build the tallest tower and old Team Leads talking about how subteams work.

timeline.title: Subteam Stations
timeline.description: Teams will set up their stations for subteam activities where new people to robotics can more easily decide what subteam they wanted to join.

timeline.title: Applications Available
timeline.description: Applications for the team became available to students.

timeline.title: Kickoff Day
timeline.description: Kickoff day announces the new challenge and what our robot will need to accomplish.
